page.title: 14CREDITS
page.content: All the work for this contribution to The Domesday Project was planned, implemented and completed by {Mr.D.J.Pentecost and his class of 3rd {year junior children (1984/85). Everybody took part and thoroughly enjoyed the work. Our thanks are due to all staff and parents of Abbotswood Junior School,Yate who made possible the various trips out into the survey area. Special thanks are due to:- {Cllr.K.Crowe}: governor. {Mrs.N.Whitelock}: student teacher. {R.Ellis}: ex-Abbotswood pupil(Age13) {Rev.Robertson}: Yate Team Ministry. {Mr&Mrs Ruff}: Westerliegh Gen. Stores. {Mr.King}: Ye Olde Inne,Westerleigh. {Mr.Tarling}: The New Inn,Westerleigh. {Mrs.M.Marsh}: Wapley Stables.
